item.text: (<st data-num="1473">My</st> <st data-num="5040" class="">little children</st>,<n id="1" /> I am <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="264" class="">sin</st>.<n id="2" />) <st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> does <st data-num="264" class="">sin</st>, we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> an <st data-num="3875" class="">advocate</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> the <st data-num="1342">Righteous One</st>,<n id="4" />
and he himself is the atoning sacrifice for our sins, and not only for our sins but also for the whole world.
Now by this we know that we have come to know God: if we keep his commandments.

The one who <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st> â€œI have come to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">God</st>â€<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="5083" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="5583" class="">liar</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778">such a person</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3739 302">whoever</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">obeys</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>, <st data-num="230" class="">truly</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this person</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has been <st data-num="5048" class="">perfected</st>. <st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> we <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
The one who says he resides in God ought himself to walk just as Jesus walked.
Dear friends, I am not writing a new commandment to you, but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word that you have already heard.

<st data-num="3825">On the other hand</st>, I am <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> a <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="227">true</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4653" class="">darkness</st> is <st data-num="3855">passing away</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="228" class="">true</st> <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">shining</st>.<n id="3" />

The one who <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> still <st data-num="3404" class="">hates</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">fellow Christian</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2193 737">still</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4653" class="">darkness</st>.

The one who <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80">fellow Christian</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3306" class="">resides</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> cause for <st data-num="4625" class="">stumbling</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />
But the one who hates his fellow Christian is in the darkness, walks in the darkness, and does not know where he is going because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
I am writing to you, little children, that your sins have been forgiven because of his name.

I am <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3962" class="">fathers</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> you have <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> him who has been <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st>. I am <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3495">young people</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="2" /> you have <st data-num="3528" class="">conquered</st> the <st data-num="4190">evil one</st>.<n id="3" />

I have written to you, children, that you have known the Father. I have written to you, fathers, that you have known him who has been from the beginning. I have written to you, young people, that you are strong, and the word of God resides in you, and you have conquered the evil one.
Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> that is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> (the <st data-num="1939" class="">desire</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desire</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="212" class="">arrogance</st> produced by <st data-num="979">material possessions</st>)<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.
And the world is passing away with all its desires, but the person who does the will of God remains forever.
Children, it is the last hour, and just as you heard that the antichrist is coming, so now many antichrists have appeared. We know from this that it is the last hour.

They went out from us, but they did not really belong to us because if they had belonged to us, they would have remained with us. But they went out from us to demonstrate that all of them do not belong to us.
Nevertheless you have an anointing from the Holy One, and you all know.

I have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="2" /> you do <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5579" class="">lie</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5583" class="">liar</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">but</st> the person who <st data-num="720" class="">denies</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5547">Christ</st><n id="1" />? <st data-num="3778">This one</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="500" class="">antichrist:</st> the person who <st data-num="720" class="">denies</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>.
Everyone who denies the Son does not have the Father either. The person who confesses the Son has the Father also.
As for you, what you have heard from the beginning must remain in you. If what you heard from the beginning remains in you, you also will remain in the Son and in the Father.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1861" class="">made</st> to<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473">us</st>: <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.<n id="4" />
These things I have written to you about those who are trying to deceive you.

Now as for you, the anointing that you received from him resides in you, and you have no need for anyone to teach you. But as his anointing teaches you about all things, it is true and is not a lie. Just as it has taught you, you reside in him.
And now, little children, remain in him, so that when he appears we may have confidence and not shrink away from him in shame when he comes back.
If you know that he is righteous, you also know that everyone who practices righteousness has been fathered by him.
